tidbits.title: Technological Innovation
tidbits.description: South Korea is globally recognized for its technological advancements, including leading brands in electronics, cars, and its fast internet infrastructure.

tidbits.title: Cultural Phenomena
tidbits.description: The country has a vibrant pop culture, known for K-pop music, Korean dramas, and a booming entertainment industry that has gained immense popularity worldwide.

tidbits.title: Rich Heritage
tidbits.description: South Korea embraces a rich cultural heritage seen in traditions like Hanbok clothing, traditional tea ceremonies, and historic palaces like Gyeongbokgung.
